section.title: Documentation
section.para: AxKit is a complex and powerful system, although getting started in AxKit is as easy as 1,2,3. The documentation here hopes to guide you through AxKit right from simple tasks such as transforming XML files using stylesheets, up to extending the AxKit application server to suit your needs.

Please start with the getting started with AxKit guide. More advanced XMLers might be interested in XPathScript - an alternative transformation language to XSLT. If XSLT were likened to awk, XPathScript would be Perl.
